description.title: Creative Copywriting for Businesses
description: $10/hr   ·   Starting at $25
Customers love to look at pictures of the products they're considering purchasing, but while colorful images can grab someone’s attention, words are what make the sell. The right combination of words

bio:
Are you in the mood for some sales-driving copy? 

Have a look at a few of my testimonials. 

"As always, he just hits it out of the park." - Philip S. 

"It was a pleasure working with you, Ben. Looking forward to the next time." - Chrissy L. 

"I love it! The text is the first thing a viewer reads when they access the site. Will use this writer again." - Paul D. 

"Benjamin is a dream to work with! I gave him about two weeks and he got it done within 48 hours." Lauren L.

"For the last time, I don't know what copywriting is. Can you please hold your nephew for a moment?" - My brother


 
My current specialty is producing About Us pages and Product Descriptions for web and product focused businesses. 

Many believe that your product descriptions and About Us pages are a spot to showcase the product and the company, but they aren't quite right. Our possible clients don't care that much about the finer details of the product, or of the company, but what it can do for them. 

That's why my descriptions and content focuses on your customers. That is, the men and women (and aliens, if you're into astro-commerce) who you're seeking to connect with. Whether you're looking to increase sales, drive donations, or showcase the benefits of your service, copy should be client-focused. 

So. If you're interested in having content created to further sales, drive donations, or further your nonprofit's  mission, fire me a message ASAP!
